name: ScholarPDF Fetcher
description: ScholarPDF Fetcher is a powerful tool for researchers and students alike, designed to streamline the process of accessing academic papers. With ScholarPDF Fetcher, you can effortlessly locate Digital Object Identifiers (DOIs) within web documents. Once identified, ScholarPDF Fetcher seamlessly retrieves and downloads the corresponding PDF documents, if available. Simplify your academic workflow and enhance your research experience with ScholarPDF Fetcher today!
